metadata.name: Drop Binaries Into Spool Drivers Color Folder
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of suspcious binary files inside the "\windows\system32\spool\drivers\color\" as seen in the blog referenced below

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('3') AND startswith(lower(file.path), lower('c:\\windows\\system32\\spool\\drivers\\color\\')) AND (endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.dll')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.exe')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.sys'))))

output.summary: Detects the creation of suspcious binary files inside the "\windows\system32\spool\drivers\color\" as seen in the blog referenced below
